verses.name: Revelation 3:14
verses.text: And unto the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write; These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of the creation of God;

verses.name: Revelation 3:15
verses.text: I know thy works, that thou art neither cold nor hot: I would thou wert cold or hot.

verses.name: Revelation 3:16
verses.text: So then because thou art lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will spue thee out of my mouth.

verses.name: Revelation 3:17
verses.text: Because thou sayest, I am rich, and increased with goods, and have need of nothing; and knowest not that thou art wretched, and miserable, and poor, and blind, and naked:
